https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/q2Z2h3gKlbGIRbbq7XlEP09Fypz.jpg "This narrative begins in an extraordinarily simple way. A camera, some friends, a whole day..." A film about memory, love, the nouvelle vague and making movies with friends. Drifting Clouds
